CustomField.description: Using this in template to identify the child records of Solution Model and display accordingly in template
CustomField.formula: IF( CPQ_Read_Option_value_for_Template__c != null, IF( ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Product__r.CPQ_Secondary_Category__c , 'Solution Model') , true,false) ,false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Using this in template to identify the child records of Solution Model and display accordingly in template
CustomField.label: Parent Check for Solution Model
